message:
学了半年英文，非常膨胀
It’s hard to see myself to be without too many flaws,
And maybe that’s the reason causing girls all have me dropped,
I have never faced a girl and know the proper way to talk,
Like an untrained chef mistaking sugar with his salt,
Or a berserk mode warrior slaying monster with his sword.
Never scored but I don’t mind, I write my own text,
Getting the right one will take time, not up for contest.
Might be single till I’m dead I won’t be feeling lonely,
So many awesome things ahead if even I’m the only.
A happy loser on a single-player cruiser,
Making it sound fun with his self-aware humour
Hold the salt, I don’t need it, I’ll have it with my sugar,
Get my sword, no more mercy, slay the motherfucking monsters.
title: 七夕rap
